name: Block Puzzle - Blast Jigsaw !
description:
"Block Puzzle" is a classic block game inspired by Quadris.

And our Block Puzzle is not just that. It is more Simple and addictive! Once you start, you will not stop playing. Just have a try, you will love it!

Drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.
The more rows you eliminate at one time, the more score you will be granted.

No time limit, you can enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
No start screen!!! Only the game and your brain.



HOW TO PLAY?
1.Simply drag the tetris pieces to move them.
2.Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
3.Blocks can't be rotated.
4.No time limits.

WHY CHOOSE THIS?
- Exquisite Game Interface!
- Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages!
- It is all FREE and No Wifi Need!
- Support leaderboard.

Please Enjoy Our Block Puzzle! The More Play and The More Exciting!!!
